tasks.description: Research and register for 1-2 networking events in Varna for late January. Check: VCCI events, tech meetups, business breakfast clubs. Target first event: Jan 26.

tasks.description: Contact Varna Chamber of Commerce & Industry about membership options. Benefits: networking events, business directory listing, credibility. See docs/strategy/C3/VCCI_Membership_Action_Plan.md

tasks.description: Final prep for first networking event (target: Jan 26). Checklist: 50 business cards ready, elevator pitch practiced, case study stories memorized, Calendly on phone, professional attire. See task_092.md for full prep guide.
